### EU DEM

[EU-DEM](https://land.copernicus.eu/imagery-in-situ) is a digital surface model (DSM) of EEA39 countries representing the first surface as illuminated by the sensors. It is a hybrid product based on SRTM and ASTER GDEM data fused by a weighted averaging approach.
